survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the engagement levels, preferences, and satisfaction of users within online gaming communities to enhance their experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in online gaming communities?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in online gaming communities?

questions.question_text: What types of games do you typically play in online communities? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox, multi-choice. Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What types of games do you typically play in online communities? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you in an online gaming community? (Select up to 3)

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you in an online gaming community? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current moderation in your primary online gaming community?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Active player base' or 'Helpful moderators' in Q3.
